body:
I would also love to see this information added to `flags-as-proto`.

My use case: For auto-completion in the [bazelrc-lsp](https://github.com/salesforce-misc/bazelrc-lsp) language server

issue.title: Extend `BazelFlagInfo` with additional metadata

labels.name: team-OSS
labels.description: Issues for the Bazel OSS team: installation, release processBazel packaging, website

repository.name: bazel
repository.description: a fast, scalable, multi-language and extensible build system

issue.body:
This commit adds additional metadata to the protobuf dump produced by `bazel help flag-as-proto`.

The old name and the deprecation message are useful to provide diagnostics within bazelrc files using a language server.
The `type_converter` and `enum_values` are usful to validate argument values and to provide auto-completion.
The option expansions can be used, e.g., to warn on contradictions between explicitly specificed flags and expansion flags.

Fixes #25006

issue.title: [8.4.0] Extend `BazelFlagInfo` with additional metadata

labels.name: team-OSS
labels.description: Issues for the Bazel OSS team: installation, release processBazel packaging, website

repository.name: bazel
repository.description: a fast, scalable, multi-language and extensible build system

issue.body:
This commit adds additional metadata to the protobuf dump produced by `bazel help flag-as-proto`.

The old name and the deprecation message are useful to provide diagnostics within bazelrc files using a language server.
The `type_converter` and `enum_values` are usful to validate argument values and to provide auto-completion.
The option expansions can be used, e.g., to warn on contradictions between explicitly specificed flags and expansion flags.

Fixes #25006

Closes #25169.

body:
A fix for this issue has been included in[Bazel 8.4.0 RC1](https://github.com/bazelbuild/bazel/releases/tag/8.4.0rc1). Please test out the release candidate and report any issues as soon as possible.
If you're using Bazelisk, you can point to the latest RC by setting USE_BAZEL_VERSION=8.4.0rc1. Thanks!
